Other Information.Test Conditions: 77 K, He carrier gas at 20 mL/min
Other Information.Additional Info: Separation resolution R = 1.52, separation time t = 10.15 min.

Sieving Mechanism: Combination of kinetic quantum sieving (KQS) and chemical affinity quantum sieving (CAQS)

Experimental Validation.Performance Metrics: H2/D2 separation resolution: 1.52, separation time: 10.15 min

Other Information.Additional Info: The material was prepared by loading ZIF-67 onto amino-modified SiO2 via layer-by-layer self-assembly method.
